summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to other legal counsel regarding the US v. Maxwell case (S2 20 Cr. 330). It serves as a courtesy copy of a court filing and includes updated contact information for Sternheim's law office.

events.title: Legal Correspondence Regarding Trial Procedure
events.description: Defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim sends an email with a courtesy copy of a court filing and updated contact information to other legal counsel involved in the US v. Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The document is an email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim regarding the US v. Maxwell case (S2 20 Cr. 330).
Sternheim provides updated office address and preferred email address in the correspondence.
The email includes a courtesy copy of a court filing made that evening, referenced as an ECF filing.
The communication is marked as external and contains a confidentiality notice from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim.
